name: Roll Kitty Roll
description:
Roll Kitty Roll is an endless rolling game with unique gameplay and simple control.

Help Kitty the cat to escape the approaching storm and you must also help kitty avoid
various obstacles along the way from sharp cactus to sudden sink holes.

Collect coins along the way to unlock adorrrrable new characters and boost kitty strength by using powerups to overcome any obstacles!

How far will you roll? Try it and find out now!

---

Features:
● Simple to start and play
● Lots of cats to unlock
● Powerful power-ups to collect
● Great visuals and graphics
● Share your score and cats with your friends
● Provide multi-languages (English, Indonesian, Chinese, Korean, Japanese)
● Leaderboards

Rate and write a review to support us.
Play Roll Kitty Roll now and keep rolling on!
